Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-2002 affecting package libdwarf for versions less than 0.9.0-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-2002 affecting package libdwarf for versions less than 0.9.0-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libdwarf is earlier than 0.9.0-3, affected by CVE-2024-2002
